Item.name: Tied Mechanic Jumpsuit
Item.description: Man it must be hot in the reactor room!

Item.name: Pressure Hardened Cuirass
Item.description: Scavenged, twisted and rebuilt by zealots this body armor has had its thorax plates replaced by a thick patiniaed alloy breastplate of unknown make.

Item.name: Clown Suit w/o Sleeve
Item.description: A multi hued costume befitting any buffish rascal.

Item.name: Cultist Sacrificer
Item.description: Similar to other robes the peculiar markings denote those who has given themselves up as oblation, embracing the obliteration of the self.

Item.name: Broken Gene Splicer
Item.description: Broken gene splicer. Could be deconstructed or sold to traders.

Item.name: Strange Mask
Item.description: Even with the utterly lost, to whom life and death are equally jests, there are matters of which no jest can be made.

Item.name: Clown Outfit with Cloak
Item.description: Worn by wandering Lost Clowns. Looks badass.

Item.name: Harlequin Suit
Item.description: A riot of colors that gives off a strange aura of sadness and indulgence.

Item.name: Jester Suit
Item.description: A garish simulacrum of garb worn by ancient Earth clowns, Staring too long you get an uneasy feeling if you stop moving you will drown.

sprite.name: Security Officer's Uniform 1 Left Lower Arm
Security Officer's Uniform 1 Right Lower Arm
Security Officer's Uniform 1 Left Upper Arm
Security Officer's Uniform 1 Right Upper Arm

Item.name: Pierrot Suit
Item.description: The white of the suit has contracted a palpable greyness. Donning it sets ones soul to dancing, be jubilent thy feet.

Item.name: Mime Mask
Item.description: The mouth says nothing but the eyes speak tragedy in volumes.

Item.name: Ragged Clown Mask
Item.description: Long exposure to sea water has distorted the smile into a warning.

Item.name: Mime Costume
Item.description: Monochrome pantomime attire, the white is a horse and dark within, drink deep and descend.

Item.name: Clown diving suit
Item.description: Looks like some maniac glued a nose and wig to this suit and painted it to look like a clown... Pressure Resistance(4000)

sprite.name: Regular Diving Suit Right Lower Arm
Regular Diving Suit Left Lower Arm
Regular Diving Suit Right Upper Arm
Regular Diving Suit Left Upper Arm

Item.name: Jovian diving suit
Item.description: A scavenged combat suit which seems to be a modified from a standard suit, but the oxygen source is an esoteric sealed chamber with a hook up for standard bottles. Pressure Resistance(5750)

sprite.name: Regular Diving Suit Right Lower Arm
Regular Diving Suit Left Lower Arm
Regular Diving Suit Right Upper Arm
Regular Diving Suit Left Upper Arm

Item.name: Heavy Jovian diving suit
Item.description: Slow, bulky and a little rusty this adhoc abyss style suit provides decent protection and almost as much depth rating, similar to other jovian suits the oxygen source is an esoteric sealed chamber with a hook up for standard bottles. Pressure Resistance(6350)

sprite.name: Regular Diving Suit Right Lower Arm
Regular Diving Suit Left Lower Arm
Regular Diving Suit Right Upper Arm
Regular Diving Suit Left Upper Arm

Item.name: Destroyed Bombers Vest
Item.description: A partially destroyed bomber vest. Lacking the bomb mechanism it can still maybe used as armor if you pressure washed it in the ballast.

Item.name: Bones
Item.description: From the moment I understood the weakness of my flesh. It disgusted me.

Item.name: Clown Exosuit
Item.description: A strange exosuit thats been marked with different colors and is very dirty and battered. It surprisingly still functions normally despite the condition its in and most of the damaged parts make the suit lighter allowing for running. Carries less items.

Item.name: Protoexo
Item.description: A heavy industrial exoskeleton fitted with a pressure suit, the smaller servos allow for laborius movement when unpowered. Protoexo such as these are the precursor to tho exosuit, and most have long since been recycled due to lack of parts or extreme damage. This rare functional example is a glimpse into the technological feats that were commonplace six decades ago. 6500m Pressure Rating

Item.name: Clown Protoexo
Item.description: A heavy industrial exoskeleton fitted with a pressure suit, the smaller servos allow for laborius movement when unpowered. Protoexo such as these are the precursor to tho exosuit, and most have long since been recycled or put on display. How the clowns have acquired so many is obsfucated further by the amount of whimsical alterations made to each suit. 6500m Pressure Rating

Item.name: Clown Prototype Exosuit
Item.description: An even older style protoexo without a seperate breathing apparatus but more storage space. Somewhat dated design though robust, Covered with comical alterations that render their true age uncertain, as the few dozen original prototypes were scraped, upgraded or put on display alongside the first RIG suits long before contact with Earth was lost, the existance of so many clown altered examples closer to the eye is yet another troubling Europan mystery. 6000m Pressure Rating
Ancient armor which seems to be sealed onto the Guardian, preventing you from removing it.

Item.name: Pierrot Mask
Item.description: ce n'est pas une poche.

Item.name: Pierrot Costume 2
Item.description: The white of the suit has contracted a palpable greyness. Donning it sets ones soul to dancing, so be jubilent thy feet.

Item.name: Jester Body Armor
Item.description: A striped purple collection of riveted aluminum and thick plastic strapped together with watcher shell fragments, somehow provides light armor.

Item.name: Jester Helmet
Item.description: A creepy helmet made out of watcher fragments, titanium and elastin.
